trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You typically use the ContentPresenter in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente utiliza o ContentPresenter no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>para especificar onde o conteúdo está a ser adicionado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a ContentPresenter in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>tipo tem um ContentPresenter no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> predefinido</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When a ContentPresenter object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto de ContentPresenter está num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Propriedades recebem os respetivos valores de propriedades dos mesmos nomes de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can have the ContentPresenter property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: Pode ter a propriedade de ContentPresenter obter os valores destas propriedades de outras propriedades do principal transformada em modelo, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>enlace às mesmas ou propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ContentPresenter uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: O ContentPresenter utiliza a seguinte lógica para apresentar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>no ContentPresenter for definida, o ContentPresenter aplica-se que <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>e respetivos elementos subordinados, se aplicável, são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>objetos, consulte [descrição geral de Templating dados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>no ContentPresenter for definida, o ContentPresenter aplica-se as adequadas <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>e respetivos elementos subordinados, se aplicável, são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Se existir um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>associados com o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, o ContentPresenter aplica-se que <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>propriedade e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>e respetivos elementos subordinados, se aplicável, são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>é um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objeto, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>já tem um principal, ocorre uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Se existir um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>que converte o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>para um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, o ContentPresenter utiliza esse <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>e resultante <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: -Se existir um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>que converte o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>numa cadeia de ContentPresenter que utiliza <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>e cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>que contém essa cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: - If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -Se o conteúdo é um <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>o valor da <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>propriedade é apresentada no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: - The ContentPresenter calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -O ContentPresenter chama o <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>método no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>e cria um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>que contém a cadeia devolvida pela <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Positions o elemento subordinado único e determina o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho que este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objeto deve utilizar para dispor o respetivo elemento subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real necessário para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o modelo a utilizar.

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode depender de conteúdo ou outras propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules: 1.
trans-unit.target: A classe base implementa as regras seguintes: 1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>estiver definido, utilizá-lo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>estiver definido, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se o resultado não está `null`, utilizá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: Procure um <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>cujo <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>corresponda a conteúdos entre os recursos conhecidos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>(incluindo dos recursos de aplicação, tema e do sistema).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: Se for encontrado um, utilizá-lo.

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>"comum", utilize um modelo padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos comuns são `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, utilize um modelo predefinido que converte essencialmente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>numa cadeia e apresenta-o no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem substituir estas regras e implementar as seus próprios.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados utilizados para gerar os elementos subordinados de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: Quando colocar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, apresenta automaticamente a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>do controlo transformada em modelo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que, se definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>do seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>seja <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a propriedade de conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>está implicitamente vinculada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que está a utilizar esse <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar os enlaces do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>Propriedades, poderá ponderar a utilização de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>propriedade aponta para uma propriedade principal transformada em modelo, bem como aliases o modelo associado e propriedades do modelo de Seletor automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML texto utilização normalmente, utiliza `TemplateBinding` para vincular este valor da propriedade para um valor no controlo transformada em modelo.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de Markup TemplateBinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: Os dados utilizados para gerar os elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome base a utilizar durante a aliasing automática.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só deve ser utilizado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>é num modelo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with ContentSource set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando um modelo contém uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>com ContentSource definido como "`Abc`", o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>são automaticamente um alias para `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, e `AbcTemplateSelector`, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting ContentSource to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], definição ContentSource como "`Abc`" também faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>propriedade para ter um alias para `AbcStringFormat`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores mais úteis para esta propriedade são "Conteúdo" e "Cabeçalho de".

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| NONE |

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: O nome base a utilizar durante a aliasing automática.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é "Conteúdo".

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>propriedade se for apresentado como uma cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat pode ser um formato de cadeia predefinidas, composto ou personalizado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os formatos de cadeia, consulte [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, a propriedade ContentStringFormat é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**| NONE |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia composta que especifica como formatar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>propriedade se for apresentado como uma cadeia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para apresentar o conteúdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> que define a visualização de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>, que permite que o escritor da aplicação fornecer a lógica personalizada para escolher o modelo que é utilizado para apresentar o conteúdo do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é ignorada se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto de XAML para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] informações, consulte [extensão de Markup TemplateBinding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that supplies logic to return a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objeto que fornece lógica para devolver um <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> a aplicar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: Determina o tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objetos com base nas propriedades de dimensionamento, margem e o tamanho pedido do conteúdo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de limite superior que não deve exceder o valor de retorno.

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho necessário para dispor o conteúdo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> should use <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> devem utilizar <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"> </xref> no seu estilo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se os processos de serialização devem serializar o valor efetivo da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>propriedade em instâncias desta classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>
